Text.Page:
The argons rely upon cyasma the way you and I rely on food and ale. There's several cyasma distillers throughout the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper}.

Find the distillers and divert the flow of cyasma. This should cause havoc for the argons and give us a chance to study their need for it.

We'll keep our eye on the argons to see how fast they respond to your little mission.

I just hope we identify an exploitable weakness.
